content.html: Programming top tip #987 Create a new project root directory *with a space in it*. For example, change: /Users/sam/Development/my_project to /Users/sam/Work Space/my_project It will *force* you to handle paths with spaces from the start and stop it biting you in the future.
content.value:
Programming top tip #987

Create a new project root directory *with a space in it*.

For example, change:

/Users/sam/Development/my_project

to

/Users/sam/Work Space/my_project

It will *force* you to handle paths with spaces from the start and stop it biting you in the future.
